Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 127th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1967...
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1972...
Traded from Chicago (N) to St. Louis on 1/31/1972 (Going to STL: 1B M. Hargrove. Going to CHC: 2B P. Gagliano)...
Injured on 4/15/1973 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1975, off Jon Matlack (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/1975, off Gary Nolan (PIT)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Pittsburgh on 4/16/1975...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1975, hitting .560 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1975, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 5/2/1976...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Drove in 7 runs against Atlanta on 10/9/1978...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1981, hitting .519 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1982, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1982, hitting .414 with 8 HR, 23 RBI...
